trans-unit.source: Notify me of new comments by e-mail (you can cancel your subscription at any time)
trans-unit.target: 通过电子邮件通知我新评论（您可以随时取消订阅）

trans-unit.source: You need to be logged in to add comments.
trans-unit.target: 您需要登录后来添加评论.

trans-unit.source:
%s has created a new comment on your website:
---
%s
---
Click here to view the comment:
%s
Click here to edit or answer the comment:
%s
trans-unit.target:
%s 已经在网站中创建了一个新的评论:
---
%s
---
点击这里查看评论:
%s
点击这里编辑或者回复评论:
%s

trans-unit.source: This comment has to be published in the back end before it will appear on the website!
trans-unit.target: 这条评论在后台发布后，将会出现在网站上!

trans-unit.source: Your comment has been added and is now pending for approval.
trans-unit.target: 您的评论已被添加，正在等待批准。

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
please confirm that you want to be notified of new comments by e-mail on this page:
%s
---
Click here to confirm your subscription:
%s
The confirmation link is valid for 24 hours. You can cancel your subscription at any time by clicking here:
%s
trans-unit.target:
您好 %s,
请确认您希望通过此页面上的电子邮件收到新评论的通知请确认:
%s
---
点击这里确认您的订阅:
%s
确认链接24小时有效。可以随时点击这里取消您的订阅:
%s

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
a new comment has been added on a page you have subscribed to:
---
%s
---
Click here to cancel your subscription:
%s
trans-unit.target:
您好 %s,
您订阅的页面已有一条新的评论:
---
%s
---
点击这里取消您的订阅:
%s

trans-unit.source: New reply to a comment on %s

Hello %s,
a new reply to a comment has been added on a page you have subscribed to:
---
%s
---
Click here to cancel your subscription:
%s
trans-unit.target:
您好 %s,
您订阅的页面中已添加一条新的评论回复:
---
%s
---
点击这里取消您的订阅:
%s
